SELECT distinct sd_cd, sd_nm FROM tl_sd ORDER BY sd_nm ASC
SELECT distinct b.sgg_cd, b.sgg_nm FROM tl_sd a JOIN tl_sgg b ON a.sd_nm = b.sd_nm WHERE a.sd_cd = #{sido} ORDER BY b.sgg_nm ASC
SELECT distinct b.bjd_cd, b.bjd_nm FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg a ON a.sgg_cd = b.sgg_cd WHERE a.sgg_nm = #{sgg} ORDER BY b.bjd_nm ASC
